posts.post_content:
I'm willing to pay a strong price for an example of a T206 Brown Lenox that presently nicely.  

Please contact me at [url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url] to discuss.  

Thanks in advance for your consideration.

Jerry

Not sure that this will actually be a secret and I'm certain it will not go without mention, but there will be a brown lenox in the REA auction shortly.

I might bid on it, but I expect it to be out of my current affordability range. Never know though. It's going to be close.

Kevin

Kevin,

I appreciate the heads up on the upcoming REA example. I actually became aware of it shortly after I had made this post because another board member sent me a PM with the information.

The last few that came up at auction were not as strong as some of the previous examples, but you never know how things will turn out.

Good luck if you go after this card.

Thanks,

Jerry
